content.rendered:
Services

INVESTING WITH CRYPTO
what we do?

We bring solutions to make life easier

My Crypto Advisor offers one-on-one and group consultations on a variety of topics and concerns relating to investing in cryptocurrency.

Blockchain & Cryptocurrency Basics

Don’t know the difference between bitcoin or blockchain? Let us demystify the industry and help you understand the technology before investing.

Book Now
Exchange Setup & Training


We'll show you how to sign up, verify your identity, and navigate exchanges.
 
 

Book Now
Hardware Wallet Setup (Ledger Nano S Included)

Let us purchase a Ledger Nano S hardware wallet on your behalf and meet for a one hour consultation where we provide assistance with setup and training on how to use your new device.

Book Now
How To Navigate Decentralized Finance (DeFi) Applications

Learn how to access DeFi applications from your Digital Wallet to earn interest or take out a loan with your cryptocurrency holdings.

Book Now
Current Information On Bitcoin, Ethereum, And Altcoins

With over 5,500 altcoins in existence, it can be difficult to keep up with the latest information.

Book Now
Transferring Coins To Wallets

Learn how to move assets between exchanges and wallets and how to properly move assets to avoid loss of funds.

Book Now
Backup and Recovery Plan For Assets

Let us teach you proper security etiquette for keeping your funds safe, how to backup and recover your assets through your seed and recovery phrase, how to recover the assets to prevent loss, and how to keep your funds safe from theft and hackers.

Book Now
How To Stake Cryptocurrencies And Generate Passive Income

Let us teach you how to invest in Proof-of-Stake (PoS) blockchains which allow you to hold and lock cryptocurrencies in a digital wallet for passive income.

Book Now
Software & Hardware Wallet Setup


Let us educate you on the differences between software and hardware wallets.
 

Book Now
How To Invest

We can teach you where and how to purchase your cryptocurrencies. With so many exchanges available, we can educate you on the NYS compliant and regulated exchanges.

Book Now
How To Order A Bitcoin Debit Card

Learn how to convert your bitcoin to USD so you can withdraw cash from an ATM or spend online and at your local grocery store with a Visa Debit Card.

Book Now
How To Navigate Web 3

Learn about the Digital Wallets and Web Browsers that support the third generation of the internet. Let us teach you how to navigate Web 3 and use Decentralized Applications (DApps).

Book Now

start working right now

Put My Crypto Advisor to work for you today and start investing.

Book Now
how it works?

Your Gateway To The Cryptocurrency Market

Discovery Session
Consultation
Global Reach
Discovery Session

Schedule a free 15 Minute Discovery Session to identify the services you require and determine if our consulting services fit your needs.

Consultation

Don’t know the difference between bitcoin or blockchain? Schedule a one-on-one or group consultation. My Crypto Advisor will demystify the industry with presentations, walk-throughs and demonstrations.

Global Reach

Due to the borderless nature of blockchain technology, My Crypto Advisor offers its services globally! Through virtual conferencing and screen sharing My Crypto Advisor can provide its services to any location in the world. If you’re located in the Western New York region, then you can schedule an in person consultation!

lets work together right now

My Crypto Advisor will take all the worry and guesswork out of your blockchain and cryptocurrency concerns. Let us help you invest today!

get started
contact us
